title: Impressive site
text: Impressive monuments on this hill. Because of "corona" the whole site was quiet and everywhere you could take your time to look, take pictures and get impressed by the site. Parking was easy, perfect near the entrance ( 10 Euro ), also because of corona no waiting

title: great food for the best price
text: Nice restaurant, near the water. Everything is almost "home made", the wines, the gyros, the bread etc etc. friendly staff, and best prices of Porto Rafti

title: Great food at a perfect location
text: Beautifull restaurant, near the water. Good chairs, nice athmosphere, perfect music and most of all great food for even better prices. Staff are super friendly, "corona-proof" , Great pizzas, fresh meat and nice dessert ( from the house ;-) )

title: Great Hotel, great athmosphere
text: Great hotel, with very nice renovated rooms. Food and drinks are good, wifi in the rooms could be better. Nice mix with French and Dutch guests, no shouting Germans, boozing English or disgusting Russians. You need a rental car, but the location of the hotel is not far from the airport or Athens. Magda and her team are really doing a great job during this crazy "corona times", we feld our whole holiday safe and secure. Thanks for having a great holiday
place: Dolce by Wyndham Athens Attica Riviera

title: Airport transfer athens
text: perfect timing, very proffesional driver, mr . Dimitris Makrakis, brought us safe and quick to our hotel. Inside the car everything was corona proof, we got even a cold closed bottle of water. If you go to Athens book your transfer via Welcome Pickups

title: great fast food
text: very tasty fast food restaurant, also in this crazy corona times everthing feld safe and fresh, good food for the best price, also friendly staff
